headline: Crawford & Company names Bruce Swain as Interim President & CEO
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: "Chip, break down what this leadership change means for Crawford & Company moving forward."

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: The escalating situation certainly raises concerns about potential consequences for all parties involved.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: The appointment of Bruce Swain as Interim President and CEO of Crawford & Company reflects strategic leadership adjustments amid evolving market conditions. This shift could indicate the company's response to current challenges and its efforts to realign with investor expectations. It will be interesting to see how this leadership change influences overall market sentiment and company performance moving forward.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Turning now to corporate leadership changes, Crawford & Company has announced Bruce Swain as its Interim President and CEO.
